mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_id, p.reservation_id, rs.member_id, m.name member_name, p.payment_method, p.payment_status, p.amount, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM payment p JOIN reservation rs ON p.reservation_id = rs.reservation_id JOIN member m ON m.member_id = rs.member_id ORDER BY p.payment_id DESC;

SELECT p.payment_id, pp.process_id, p.reservation_id, m.name AS member_name, p.payment_method, p.payment_status, p.amount, p.transaction_id, p.created_at AS payment_date, p.updated_at AS payment_update, pp.created_at AS process_created_at, pp.process_status AS process_status FROM payment p JOIN reservation rs ON p.reservation_id = rs.reservation_id LEFT JOIN payment_process pp ON p.reservation_id = pp.reservation_id JOIN member m ON m.member_id = rs.member_id WHERE p.payment_id = #{paymentId} ORDER BY pp.created_at ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( reservation_id, amount, payment_method, payment_status, transaction_id, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{reservationId}, #{amount}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentStatus}, #{transactionId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id, rt.name AS room_name, r.check_in, r.check_out, rt.base_occupancy, rt.max_occupancy, r.total_amount FROM reservation r JOIN room rm ON rm.room_id = r.room_id JOIN room_type rt ON rt.room_type_id = rm.room_type_id WHERE r.reservation_id = 1;
